title: Designing English Learning Strategies Using ChatGPT

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Students acquire practical strategies for effectively using ChatGPT in English learning, with project-based assessments measuring learning outcomes. Learning motivation and usage intention are analyzed based on the Unified Theory of Acceptance and Use of Technology (UTAUT).

learning_goals: Learners can enhance their ability to analyze and generate English sentence structures using ChatGPT.
Learners can identify technology acceptance factors through UTAUT model-based surveys and design personalized learning strategies.

Learners use ChatGPT to create a 5-minute English presentation and demonstrate practical application skills by achieving ≥70/100 points on a presentation rubric (content organization 30%, language fluency 30%, technology utilization 40%).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
